plugin.name: ‚ö°Ô∏è Quick Capture
plugin.description: Commands to more quickly add tasks/todos or general text to NotePlan notes. See website for configuration of special Inbox note, and how to use from other apps through x-callback calls.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: quick add task to inbox
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task to your 'üì• Inbox' note

plugin.commands.name: quick add task under heading
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task to a chosen note's section heading
arguments: note title (or YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-Wnn for an existing calendar note)
note section heading to add text under

plugin.commands.name: quick add line under heading
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add text to a chosen note's section heading
arguments: note title (or YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-Wnn for an existing calendar note)
note section heading to add text under

plugin.commands.name: quick add to daily note
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to a chosen Daily note

plugin.commands.name: quick add to weekly note
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to a chosen Weekly note

plugin.commands.name: quick add to journal today
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append text to the Journal in today's note

plugin.commands.name: quick prepend task to daily note
plugin.commands.description: Quickly prepend a task to a chosen daily note

plugin.commands.name: quick append task to note
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to a chosen project note

plugin.commands.name: quick prepend task to note
plugin.commands.description: Quickly prepend a task to a chosen project note

plugin.settings.title: Inbox note title
plugin.settings.description: The Title of your Inbox note, or leave empty ("") to use the daily note instead. Default "üì• Inbox"

plugin.settings.title: Where to Add to Inbox or Weekly note
plugin.settings.description: Where to Add to Inbox note: start (prepend) or end (append)

plugin.settings.title: Text to append to new inbox tasks
plugin.settings.description: specify text (including hashtags or mentions) that will be appended to all new tasks created using the `/int` command
